name: Azza Gremlin
description: The Azza Gremlin is a small fey creature known for its mischievous nature and affinity for lightning, distinguished by its vibrant energy and electric abilities.
memorable: Its ability to manipulate lightning and teleport along bolts makes it a tricky opponent who can control the battlefield.
goals: Causing mischief and utilizing its lightning abilities to disrupt foes.
relations: Often found near other fey creatures or as a chaotic element in natural environments.
environment: Typically inhabits areas associated with thunderstorms or enchanted forests.
strengths: Immunity to lightning and thunder damage, highly dexterous with a strong ability to evade attacks.
weaknesses: Very low Strength limits its capability for melee combat.
attacks: Lightning Jolt deals 6 lightning damage and can impose the Contagious Lightning effect on its target.
most_powerful_ability: Contagious Lightning makes foes vulnerable to future lightning attacks and can paralyze them if struck again.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 120 feet, enhancing its sensory perception in dim conditions.
additional_information: Can communicate in Common and Primordial, relying on its Charisma for interactions.
High Dexterity allows for effective dodging.
Ability to teleport along lightning bolts adds strategic depth.
Imposes disadvantage on saving throws against spells for affected creatures.
Fragile due to low Hit Points.
